website_summaries.verdict: If you’re seeking firm support and relief from seated posture or injury-induced back pain, this cooling car seat cushion is a solid choice. Ideal for therapeutic use, but may be a bit too tall and hard for some.
pros: Contoured design with coccyx cutout is especially helpful for a range of lower back issues, from tailbone injuries to herniated disks
High density memory foam provides form fitting support
Topped with a gel layer for a comfortable, cooling effect
Can be used in just about any seat
Non slip base helps reduce sliding
Plush cover is removable and machine washable for easy cleaning
cons: Tall drivers may find it too lofty
A handful of users felt it was too firm

customer_reviews.title: Sitting on this feels like I'm losing my virginity
customer_reviews.text: There is no other way to explain it, this cushion is uncomfortable as all get out. While it does relieve some pain off my lower back, the bump and strange shape of the cushion spreads my legs and digs into my crack that it actually hurts. IT feels like I'm constantly on the toilet. I had to put some hydrocortizone cream on it because I think I got some sort of hemorrhoid or something. It hurts I tell you! I position the cushion exactly where I'm supposed to but it's no use. Sitting on a plain old cotton pillow is actually less painful than this.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony .

customer_reviews.title: No more numb bum.
customer_reviews.text: As an audiobook narrator, I spend a great deal of time propped on my bum. It's difficult to concentrate on the book you're narrating when your bum goes numb. After trying a collection of folded towels and foam bed pillows, I took a chance on the ComfiLife pillow. OH MY. I can now sit for hours in complete posterior comfort. I thank you, and my listeners thank you.
customer_reviews.author: J. Seybert

customer_reviews.title: *WARNING* DO NOT USE ON LEATHER or nice fabric such as an office chair
customer_reviews.text: *WARNING* DO NOT USE ON LEATHER or nice fabric such as an office chair. I purchased this to add more support and just a bit of height to my $400 La-Z-Boy leather office chair. The bottom has a metal zipper lining and metal zipper with sharp edges. After just 2 days of use I noticed a strange wear mark on my brand new chair. I had to sew a flap of fabric over the zipper handle or I would have ruined a $400 chair in about a week. Very poor design, it's so easy for them to make a flap to tuck the zipper in to.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R Redding

customer_reviews.title: How hard the cushion us dispute it having gel in the cushion
customer_reviews.text: I've broken my tailbone twice and lost my old seat cushion on vacation...I thought this would do the trick...but it was so hard and got harder as the temperature rose..it was to uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! with update after 5 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and stays put on my seat. UPDATE: After only 5 months, it has really flattened out. I really expected the cushion to last much longer. Yes, I do sit for 7-8 hours a day, but I only weigh 110 pounds. If you weigh more, I expect it will last even less time. Because of the short lifespan of the product, I changed my rating from 5 stars to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Foam cushion doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: I have it for only a month and when I changed the cover to wash I noticed the foam already ripped. New edition: After my 2 stars review I got a response from the ComfiiLife and they sent me a new replacement. For their courtesy and fast response I changed from 2 stars to 4 stars. Hope the second one lasts!
customer_reviews.author: R. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Not as it seems!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for comfort on my back. But can't figure out why the fabric has lifted off the gel bottom? And the seat where my behind sits has gotten flat. Very uncomfortable to me, with Multiple Sclerosis. I don't know how to put a photo on the website, or it would be here. Personally I just can't recommend this to anyone. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Wrong cushion
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gel enhanced cushion, the only reason I'm giving this item one star is because I got the seat cushion without the gel. I am a truck driver so it's not very profitable to have to stop ever couple hundred miles just because my rear goes numb from sciatic. I am very disappointed I got the wrong cushion but I dont think it's worth the extra cost to return and hopefully get the correct one nor can I wait any longer to try to get relief.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened.
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the negative reviews. This cushion offers no support. Just a piece of foam that crushes totally. I ordered to replace a cushion I ordered a couple of years ago that was great. There was support. The hollowed out area did what a lumbar cushion should, it kept my tush totally off the seat at the back cut out area. This one however my tush is in total contact with the seat under it. Useless and uncomfortable. Smashes down paper thin under your body weight. Should have know when the video shoes someone squeezing the cushion flat that that means NO support.
customer_reviews.author: SallySunshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cushion. Very firm. Love the tail bone space ...and it works well for tails.
customer_reviews.author: Pounce

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and gives me a little boost!
customer_reviews.text: Had it delivered to work and started using it the minute I unboxed it. No weird odor on mine. I felt the difference right away in my sitting posture and took the pressure off my tail bone. It also gave me about 2 inches while sitting which I was also looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Hill

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, not a good cushion. Will give you back issues :(
customer_reviews.text: I had pretty high hopes for this cushion but unfortunately it just hurts my back so bad after getting up from sitting in this thing. I sat on it for maybe 5-10 minutes and my back just has so much pain. The pain only takes place once I stand up or shift my body. I also want to add, I do not have any back issues. Thanks but I will have to shop around for another cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Flattens out quickly if your over 190 pounds.
customer_reviews.text: Flattens out quickly if you weigh over 190 pounds, thereby, losing 80% of its usefulness. I weigh 210, which is ideal for my 6'4" height, so it is not like I am overweight. I estimate that is 100% useful if you weigh less than 150 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allen Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very effective pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This strange pillow is surprisingly effective. I have chronic lower back pain and have had 2 back surgeries. The pain relief was instant when I sat down. It cradles the coccyx, relieves back pain and cools your butt while you drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG ... this is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: OMG ... this is fantastic! My sister has had several fainting episodes and always seemed to land on her tailbone. She has also had back surgery to attempt to correct her bulging discs (also from her falls), but that made her worse. She has been unable to sit in any chair comfortably ... until now. This cushion finally gave her the relief she has been searching for. I'm so happy for her, I could cry. Thank you so much for your wonderful product. Highly recommend to anyone with similar pains.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the office! helps alleviate pressure!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a running who has frequent hip pain and issues with the piriformis muscle (muscle deep in buttock area that pushes against sciatica when inflamed). I bought this for the office due to the long hours of sitting all day, it really really helps!! The piriformis is greater irritated by long periods of sitting and pressure against it, this cushion helps alleviate some of that pressure! At first I felt silly because I'm only 32 and some others in the office poked fun, but they have since ordered one after trying mine!!! I think anyone that has to sit for extended hours a day should def order one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Goode

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not very big. Helped heal my injured sacrum.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for an injured sacrum (the bone around the tailbone) and it made sitting bearable during healing. So comfy my driver seat feels hard without it! Only problem I find is it is not long or wide enough to support your thighs. So the edges of the cushion leave uncomfortable areas on your thigh and buttocks. I am no fat ass by any means, 6'1'' 160 lbs. I know there are folks out there with twice the butt I have! Would be 5 star if 4" wider and 6-8" longer.
customer_reviews.author: 5string

customer_reviews.title: Not just for health reasons, it's also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My review is not based on health benefits. I've had an office chair for years and the seat is in need of cushioning. I saw this and decided to spend the extra money over a simple fabric filled type. I love this. It feel great. And while I have not had any issues with my tail bone, the design does make it much more comfortable. So, this is not only for those who are looking to help with health issues, but also good for anyone just looking for something comfortable. As an added note, I noticed several reviews mention problems with the quality. Because of that, I immediately checked the inner cushioning and saw no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Uki

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no from me
customer_reviews.text: Received this seat cushion today and I was so excited to use it. It was so uncomfortable, I didn’t like it at all! The raised part in the back felt like it was going way up my crack (sorry to be so crude) and made everything feel numb after 30 minutes. I am a plus size gal, so maybe that’s why? But I can’t continue to sit on this uncomfortable thing. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: goes flat
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before I bought this. I wanted something that would hold up to being sat on all day. this thing goes flat and my tail bone touches the office chair after one hour. I purposefully bought one that had gel because I thought it would hold up better than the standard memory foam. this does not serve its purpose. It goes flat and doesnt keep my spine off of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sciatica
customer_reviews.text: I have had a severe pain in my right hip for about 4 months now. I talked to my doctor and he recommended this item to me. I purchased it the next week after my appointment. I have been using it for about 2 weeks now and can really tell the difference. I do a lot of traveling and while sitting for long periods of time the pain would be very discomforting. My traveling now is smooth and comfortable. This is a very good product. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Avery

customer_reviews.title: Too hard,
customer_reviews.text: It was hard and difficult to sit on. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: smokinjj

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Soft Booster Cushion
customer_reviews.text: This should have a weight capacity of 110 lbs. for regular people like me 6”1’ 215 lbs it does not hold up and only fits under one butt cheek. This should have a title of “Toddler Soft Booster Cushion” I’m not fat I’m just a study giant. You are better off putting a cheap pillow under you! Not worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Xander T.

customer_reviews.title: Zero support
customer_reviews.text: Within 5 minutes, this thing was flat as a pancake under me. Sending it right back.
customer_reviews.author: It's a Burgh Thing

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Oh my this was a real life saver. I had a pinched sciatic nerve on my left side. The pain was excruciating and I could not set for ling periods of time at work. I got this and it helped out immensely! I did notice that it has helped my posture and setting correctly at my desk. I no longer lean to the left. If I do I notice the cushion is flatter on the one side so I flip it over so it can straighten me out.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Seaburn

customer_reviews.title: Solves My Driving Dilemma
customer_reviews.text: My 2015 Elantra sits very low and it is very difficult for me to see oncoming cars and also park my vehicle properly. I saw a very nice "booster seat" in my DIL's Subaru SUV and asked her where she found it. She said, "Amazon" and sent me a link to the website page. I checked out the details and customer reviews and ordered it right away. Have used it for about a week now and it is certainly making me feel less anxious when I start to pull out from a dead stop and also while parking in public parking lots. I would recommend the ComfiLife seat cushion to anyone! The price is very reasonable too!
customer_reviews.author: S. Abendschoen

customer_reviews.title: causes pain during drives
customer_reviews.text: For the purpose of using it in the car as a cushion for support, I found this to actually cause more pain. Because it is so thick, it is easy to fall off the cushion - for lack of a better way to explain it - therefore pushing your hips out of alignment. I purchased this for long drives, and find myself in more pain after the drives. Not happy with the cushion, and no longer able to use it. Wish I had a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: It Took The Pain Away
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an over the road truck driver so he sits for hours and hours while doing his job. He started complaining about lower back pain from the constant jiggling from the truck. I ordered this seat and asked him to give it a try. Well not even a full week has passed and he loves it. Doesn’t complain about his lower back as much and says there’s days he doesn’t feel any pain. It’s so thick and cushioned very well.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Drive Medical Scout Compact Travel Power Scooter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the Drive Medical Scout Compact Travel Power Scooter. The seat on the scooter isn't all that comfortable but with the ComfiLife cushion it's sheer bliss! I could easily use the scooter all day long and into the night without a second thought. I would HIGHLY recommend this to anyone regardless what kind of seat you want to use it on. Have fun and go easy on you're buns!
customer_reviews.author: Leyland B. French

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable For a Sedan
customer_reviews.text: This product would be okay in an office setting or in your home. But I purchased this cushion for my car and it's very uncomfortable. The problem is the height of the cushion. Even with my seat setting at its lowest, my head touches the car roof. Even after the cushion is compressed a bit, my head is still very close to touching the roof. I drive a 2014 Honda Accord, and I'm 5' 10". Maybe if I drove a big SUV, it would be okay. But in a sedan where there isn't as much headspace, this cushion makes you sit too high and it's uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: HERO

customer_reviews.title: very good item
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but I have the same problem that I do with my memory foam pillows, it pushed you forward as the memory foam bunches up in the back. So sit with your but almost overlapping the back and you wont have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: An avid Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Excellent when used on exercise equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried four different expensive cushions for my rower/incumbent bike and they all felt like a slab of concrete under my butt. This one is the least expensive of those that I tried and it is wonderful. It does not slid around on the machine's seat as others did but stays in place so you do not have to be continually adjusting it. The cushion almost instantly adjust to the shape of one's body which makes it's very comfortable. After an hour of exercise I am still comfortable with no sore sports or chaffing. I'm not sure how it works when used differently but it's performance is superior when used on exercise rowing/bike machines.
customer_reviews.author: Don Masters

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Excellent seller.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pillow and the quality seems very good. The cover looks nice and it fits properly. There is absolutely nothing wrong with this pillow. It was just too firm for my wife. Had it been a little thinner or a little softer, we would have kept it. The seller was great in contacting me to see if we liked it and offering a 100% money back guarantee when it did not suit our needs. Purchase without fear..
customer_reviews.author: Recorder

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have to sit at work. My back and hips were killing me. I purchased the seat cushion and took it to work. I gave it one week (40 hours) to see how well it worked. Not much different than sitting on a pillow, which I was doing previously. Still experienced pain in the same areas. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Helpful Cushion
customer_reviews.text: Well Built. Very comfortable. I use this as a cushion for my recumbent bike. It sure keeps the tailbone from hurting on longer sitting times. I would prefer if it was a flatter more generic shape as I have to adjust it every time I use it because it has a unique design so you have to be sitting on it perfectly. But considering it has fixed my issues, that's really not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: Immediate pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work. I fell off a ladder and messed up my back, resulting in debilitating back and hips pain, it hurts to even sit down! First I bought a memory foam topper for my bed, now I sleep and wake up with less pain. So I starting looking at seat cushions, I decided on this one because of the gel...I saw many reviews saying it gave them better relief than the foam alone. I don’t care if it looks strange me carrying it from chair to chair....the pain I DON’T feel has changed my life for the better! Thank you ComfiLife! I will be purchasing a second for my car as well, and a matching lumbar support!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Simply awful
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most uncomfortable cushion I have sat on. It hard and not in a good way. It feels like I am sitting on a brick. Using this for just 2 days has exacerbated my back pain as well as caused additional pain in my thighs and posterior region. I do not understand how this product has good reviews, they must be paid for. If you would like to actively damage your back, only then by this product. I would give this product negative stars if I could it is simply AWFUL. This product is incorrectly designed and can severely compress your nerves and damage your spine. Please stay away from this terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I usually have issues with tailbone pain within the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: Extremely satisfied and have purchased 2 more cushions for others whom I know will benefit from using it. I usually have issues with tailbone pain within the first 2 hours of a road trip. I bought this in anticipation of a lengthy trip with as many as 7 hours in the car. I honestly forgot there was an issue. My husband had to remind me that I never mentioned being uncomfortable. That's huge! I will be purchasing more, and my husband wants one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Too thick, bad 'fit'
customer_reviews.text: Hard, thick and very uncomfortable. I have chronic lower back pain from scoliosis and have to use a sit/stand work station for 9 hours at the computer every day. I had hoped this would help during my 'sit' phases, but I end up having to 'jump' up to get into it, then the contours don't fit my body at all and the cushion tips me forward. I should have bought a thinner flat cushion but trusted the reviews. I should have known better - Fakespot gives this item a 'C' rating. It's a Chinese company and they are notorious for 'buying' fake reviews. A waste of $35, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Kbo

customer_reviews.title: Can't do without it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Comfilife cushion. I liked my first one so much that I got another one for the car. I have sciatica pain and arthritis in my back. The cushion makes a tremendous difference in my comfort level. I also have the knee pillow for night time. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: viki

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: After sitting on it continuously for more than 30 minutes, it gets squished down so it no longer offers comfort. I had it on my wheelchair on which I was sitting continuously for 3 hours or so. Weight doesn't matter but if you don't get up every 30 min., this cushion gets squished by continuous pressure on it so it becomes uselessly thin. This review is from my personal experience.
customer_reviews.author: PickyjadeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great depending on the chair
customer_reviews.text: Read the mixed reviews, but decided to try the Comfilife cushion. Tried it on my den chair and love it. Relieves the pressure from my tailbone and is comfortable. Tried it on my chair in the living room. Was surprised, it didn’t feel like the same cushion. It bunched up underneath me into an uncomfortable mass. The difference is my living room chair is softer than my den chair. So try this cushion on several chairs before giving up on it. If your chair is super soft and cushy, this might not be the right cushion for you. If your chair is on the firm side, try this cushion!
customer_reviews.author: Faux Diva

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this product only aggravated my sciatic nerve leg pain. I ended up with pain for about a month although i removed the item after two weeks of use. I think it was too thick making my right leg be pushed inward causing me the acute leg pain. I used it on my office chair. Maybe it just wasn't the right product for my condition. The quality seemed excellent.
customer_reviews.author: SkyeLove

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my seamstress mom who suffers from excessive back pain and she absolutely loves this cushion. She said it alleviates the pain and allows longer time at the sewing machine. She is over 70 and has had severe issues with her back and spinal nerves, uses tems pulse device, pain meds, steroid shots, acupuncture massage, etc and this is the only consistent relief she’s had.
customer_reviews.author: domrie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Makes sitting for long periods of time at my computer possible. I’m also short (5 feet 2 inches) and it makes a great booster seat for driving. The only hang up I have about it is that my legs dangle off the edge and it can be a little uncomfortable and create a little tingling so I have to be aware and position myself properly and extend my legs or prop my feet on a stool or something but I’m almost positive this will only be an issue for short people! It’s still worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Demetra Nakos

customer_reviews.title: Does not give proper support
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic back pain with tail bone pressure. At first the pillow supported by back and relieved the pressure on my tail bone area. With time it mashed down around the hole and my bottom started going through the hole to the hard seat below. I found this actually increased by back pain. After a few months of use I'm back to sitting on a flat chair with less pain than with the pillow. I am not a fat woman so was surprised to see it flatten out around the hole. I gave it one star because it did work for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Houndawg

customer_reviews.title: Life and limb saver!
customer_reviews.text: Since this global pandemic started, I was lucky enough to still have a job and work from home..my lower back wasn't lucky enough tho from all the sitting and sedentary lifestyle since then. My chair did not survive the prolonged sitting. Had to be practical nowadays & refused to buy a new chair so I tried to self medicate with this and oh boy it just works wonders! My lower back pain is gone after a day of sitting on it. My posture is in a relaxed position and i couldn't be happier with this purchase. I bought the package that has the back pillow. Buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: magi

customer_reviews.title: Ended my hip pain. Love this cushion.
customer_reviews.text: I do not fully understand exactly how this cushion works, but it does. Sitting in my work chair for an hour or two had my hips hurting so badly that it hurt to walk. Since getting this cushion, I haven’t had any pain or trouble - even after hours of sitting. The cushion does shift around on the chair, but that’s my only complaint. I haven’t had any of the problems some users report. My cushion doesn’t squish flat and shows no sign of manufacturers defects. I’m planning on getting another for my car!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tish

customer_reviews.title: Seat cushion
customer_reviews.text: This seat cushion was so uncomfortable I had to return it. The problem for me was the coccyx cut out section that caused discomfort and required constant sitting position adjustment. I spend hours on end at the computer in my chair and I need to be as comfortable as possible considering the time I spend sitting. For my comfort, I need a seat cushion that offers even and entire surface coverage not unlike the coverage provided by a sofa, recliner, or chair cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Sonjia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Siactic problem solver
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how I'd like it. But since I travel one hour one way to work on SF bart and would look funny carrying a butt pillow around. But it does make "my" sciatic pain go away instantly I was a true skeptic about it. However the should make a big guy pillow as well. Not to take away from the product but it should be offered in two sizes at least. I'm over the 220 mark . Yet still I would recommend this pillow to anyone having sciatic pains.
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: Pancake
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more from this. Around the end of July, my tailbone started bugging me when I sat down. I don't know if I need to do more squats and build my butt back up or what, but I was looking for some relief, so I chose this seat. However, this cushion basically squishes almost completely flat when I sit on it and does not offer the comfort and support I was hoping for. Likewise, the gel doesn't cool like I would expect. I think I noticed it once. It has good construction and looks just like the picture, but for me, I don't know that it actually helps relieve any pain.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hendley

customer_reviews.title: No what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: With the high reviews, I expected this to be "the answer" for us. Husband sits all day and couch or chair had become uncomfortable. This did not help him, partly because its shape is awkward and partly because it doesn't take up a lot of space on the chair, so if he moves a bit from one side to the other, it leaves him unbalanced. It just wasn't comfortable. We do like the Travel Mate Extra Large Memory foam pad that is 19 x 17 x 3, though.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter's MomTop Contributor: Scrapbooking

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me, but ComfiLife made it right.
customer_reviews.text: I weight about 230 lbs. I found that the density of the material may be better for folks that weight substantially less than I do. Also, the gel padding and the cover material is +HOT+ and uncomfortable, when the weather is warmer. I contacted ComfiLife and they were very accommodating. They stand behind their product 100% and for that, I give them 10 stars. They offered me a refund and processed it pronto. It’s great to work with a seller that makes life easy.
customer_reviews.author: Motorcycle Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: I wish I found this 6 years ago after my accident!
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is excellent! Stays firm enough after you sit on it so your tailbone is not touching the seat and the gel holds the heat so my tush stays warm! Such a great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: MorganTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: What a great cushion. Had to think of an easy way to make working from home more comfortable. We only have one computer chair in the office so I purchased this to use on a dining room chair to make it more comfortable to sit on all day working from my laptop in the dining room. I moved it to the floor to play with my son and was delighted at how comfortable I was for the duration. Will be great to bring on long car rides or to the kids soccer game for the terrible bleachers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it got flat
customer_reviews.text: When I got it, the cushion was thick and hard and seemed perfect; however, it hasn't been more than a few months, and it's become flat. I'm pretty disappointed with the product. I might as well be sitting on my chair without the cushion. It also comes with a warranty on the company website, but I couldn't find a place to get help. So the warranty is no help too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My back has never felt this good.
customer_reviews.text: I took this cushion and the lumbar back support on a plane and didn't sound like a glowstick. No matter the seat (couch, plane, wood chair, floor, even in bed) I've noticed my back is less hyperextended and the pain is minimal. My posture is improving again too because this seat supports my tailbone, so it is training my spine to be straighter. I have fibromayalgia and lupus, so my body is constantly in some sort of joint or muscle pain. This cushion is my new best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Zoë

customer_reviews.title: It works!  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Deserves 10 stars! I have sciatic pain in my tailbone, back and my leg/buttocks was numb after sitting for a couple hours in an office chair with no cushion (for the past 3 mos). After using this pillow for 2 days, no pain in my tailbone, just a little in my back and expect it to improve. I would not have believed this if someone had told me, I'm amazed, great product. Bought one for home and one for work.
customer_reviews.author: Pianone

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good
customer_reviews.text: Two of my friends have performance cars and their seats hurt me, in as little as 30 minutes. I bought two different seat cushions and this one worked the best. And I also used both, which worked the best. Although, this makes it hard to get into their cars.  Second cushion used, expensive (see note below #):  # Note: This looks like whats sold at Walmart, but this one works (see 2nd cushion used above), although not that good by its self. The Walmart one, compresses with a single finder and I have somewhat weak hands. This cushion might be OK on padded office chair.
customer_reviews.author: AntennaMan

customer_reviews.title: Takes pressure off my crushed coccyx.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on other reviews. I love this. My coccyx is crushed with no available fix, not to mention 3 level fusion on L3,L4, L5. Hurneated S1, and disc degeneration. Sitting has literally become excruciating. I have a trip coming up and was dreading the plane ride, remembering my last. I purchased this for my trip. Now, I use it every day to sit at our dinner table for dinner with the family again. It hasn’t fully eliminated my problems but it DEFINATELY HELPS OUT LOADS giving much more relief. My coccyx says THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Butler

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow because, like everyone else, I'm stuck at home. I'm at my computer desk a lot so my body would really feel the strain at the end of the day. I also sit weird (not upright) so that puts a bit more strain. I've had this pillow for a few days and it's been very helpful. The material is durably dense and it still holds its shape even though I sit on it pretty much all day (I'm ~160 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Annie Chompoo

customer_reviews.title: IMMEDIATE RELIEF!
customer_reviews.text: After having major surgery last year, I noticed minor but annoying hip and lower back pain. As soon as the cushion was delivered, I tried it out and ahhh, the back adjusted (popped a little), hip felt no pressure and more aligned and dull lingering headache went away. Wow! Why didn't I seek out a product like this earlier? But this cushion needs 10 stars because the quality is there, no doubt. I WILL be buying more of these for other sitting areas and gifts for friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but don't know about pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice product, very comfortable. I just don't know that it relives pain. I do know it doesn't cause pain. I did end up returning this one, because it didn't fit my standard sized office chair (Steelcase Leap) as it was too small. Apparently, you need to get the XL version and they didn't have any available. Had to go with a different manufacturer. MEASURE YOUR CHAIR BEFORE YOU BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable Cushion
customer_reviews.text: I love this cushion. I purchased the first cushion because of a slow-to-heal tailbone injury that has long since healed. This is the second one I've purchased, because I gave my original cushion to my daughter. She dreaded making her 700 mile drive home, because of the discomfort of driving to visit me. I had this cushion and one other same style but different brand cushion that I use interchangeably in my car, my office, and anywhere I'll be sitting for an extended period of time. It even has a carry handle. My daughter called to let me know she was able to walk comfortably when she arrived home. I definitely recommend this cushion.
customer_reviews.author: C. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Best help for sacral/ lumbar nerve pain
customer_reviews.text: Great to relieve pressure on lower back ( lumbar/sacral). Superior to donut pillows of the past. I broke my sacrum, crushed the discs, fractured lumbar vertabrae, had spinal surgery & am in constant pain. I bought this pad for my sewing studio & for sitting at the computer. It made a positive difference in how long a period I can sit. It is a bit on the firm side, so it is not a soft comfort cushion, rather, it does a great job protecting the lower spine from too much pressure.
customer_reviews.author: M Krenz

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with this cushion
customer_reviews.text: This is a one size fits all product and that is the down side to this cushion. If you're a petite person this product may be great for you but after having for ten months I'm not very impressed with the item not am I happy with this cushion. It's simply too small and too thin. For me this cushion is extremely uncomfortable and actually causes leg pain on the back of my thigh. I want to contact the seller but there are no links to reach out and talk to the seller. Very disappointed by that. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Norris

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: You have to light up one star in order to post a review. 1 minus 1 is 0. These are described as being the best of this kind of seat cushion. They're priced higher unless you purchase them when they're discounted. Even then, they're not worth the money. They don't provide any help at all. I'm in more pain than I was without it! The old couch pillows I was using provided more comfort than this cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Gone to the dogs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seat cushion
customer_reviews.text: Long haul over the country trucker approved! The sushi is fantastic and works for a driver who sits for 10-12 hours per day. The cushions does get hard in cold weather. It softens and is comfortable with your body heat in no time though. We are happy repeat customers and added these to our cars as well, even with long international travels as well as being in a semi-truck. I don't feel like I keep needing to shift my position and my sciatica bothers me very little now that I have one in my car. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LilyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Just know it may not be as comfortable as you think
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited receiving the gel cushion; my friend let me use her's before I bought one. However, was so disappointed with exactly the same one. When sitting, my rear hurt the whole time sitting (like 2 hours) The cushion was very hard. Just couldn't believe it had gel inside. I gave it some time (like 3 weeks) thinking it would soften up, but it didn't. I do not like posting negative reviews, especially when my friends was so comfortable, but this was so disappounting. I sent it back and Amazon cheerfully refunded me. I am on the look for another brand. Maybe i received one that was defective; whatever the case, was not at all comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Greenhatgal54

customer_reviews.title: Comfort pad.
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer drive a van for the VA. The new van I was assigned has a driver's seat that feels like thin cloth covered plywood. As the trips I take are an hour and half drive one way my bum gets VERY sore. This cushion very much solves this problem. The only shortcoming is it is too short for my thigh length. If pushed back to cushion my tailbone the padding hits me high on my thighs and, eventually, lessens circulation. If pushed forward to properly support my thighs, my bum feels like it is hanging in space. But overall, VERY pleased with this product. (and yes, the pun "shortcoming - short" is intentional}. Sorry..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total lifesaver for working from home without a proper office chair!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a game changer. I’ve been working from home for over a month now at my kitchen table and with herniated discs and other nerve pain issues in my hips, sitting all day in my kitchen chairs was really taking a toll. I used a memory foam pillow for a cushion for a while and it definitely helped but I was still hurting. This thing has completely resolved my pain from sitting in that chair for hours on end. Some reviews said it goes completely flat pretty quickly but that has not been my experience. I weigh 180 and haven’t had any issues with it going flat or anything. It has really been a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: My Experience.. yours may vary.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this seat cushion for an office chair that is terribly uncomfortable. I was hoping a gel cushion might improve the seating comfort to the extent that the chair would be more usable. This cushion flattens out and does little to nothing for the purpose I bought it for. It may provide orthopedic advantages for a 5 foot 120 pound person, but for a 6 foot 300 pound person, my wallet provides better support and cushion than this does. As my headline says.. your experience may vary based on your purpose and expectation.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I’m still breaking it in , but the seat cushion seems to be helping me sit more comfortably. Hurt my tailbone and been difficult sitting because of it . I’m hoping once I break the pillow in a little more and mold it to my body it will be even better . I’ve tried another cushion that did not work at all , so so far this is much more comfortable. And is made really well too ! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: tuffy

customer_reviews.title: so nice what a difference
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and sit my chair for 8 to 12 hours a day. my legs don't fall asleep or my butt. I still get up to walk and stretch but I am a bigger person so I needed something thicker and comfortable and this does it for me. I also bought the lumbar support back pillow too along with it, with both of them is so much better. They don't slide around they stay in place with no problem. I am glad I bought them and highly recommend them if you sit in front of a computer all day in a chair that doesn't have all the comforts.
customer_reviews.author: mad max

customer_reviews.title: Work from Home necessity
customer_reviews.text: When my office required everyone to work from home during this pandemic, this cushion was ordered on day 2. When your dining room becomes your office, you need this pillow. The gel is thick and the quality is great. Best work cushion ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good product - Annoying Warranty Policy
customer_reviews.text: Best of three that I tested. Provides the most support with the least amount of heat buildup and it retains its shape/comfort/firmness. Helped me with my lower back and hip pains that were created with Work From Home for 8 hours a day. The "lifetime warranty" only being valid if you register within 14 days is silly. I took more than 14 days just to decide if the product was worth keeping. Its the reason I took off 1 star. If there is a lifetime warranty, then we should have more time to register it. The 14 day time limit is just a way to avoid honoring warranty claims. Bad business practice.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews worth reading

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like this cushion. I bought it because I've been having to sleep sitting up due to sinus drainage, and my tailbone would ache by morning. With this cushion it doesn't hurt as much. I'm not sure it was meant to be sat on continuously for a whole night, so towards morning I still have a bit of pain. It definitely makes a difference, though. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: GRETCHEN SNODGRASS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Supportive Cushion
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cushion to use on concrete and other hard surfaces like stadium bleachers. Very easy to transport. Product does conform to your body and does not get hot. Definitely recommend this cushion vs. stadium cushions. Used this over the Memorial Day weekend to view sailboat races that went on for several hours. Best seating is on a concrete barrier wall. Experienced no discomfort during use and I was able to brush away any sand that accumulated on bottom of cushion. Love the fact that the bottom is sturdy and rubberized plastic and is non-slip.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you measure the seat depth!!! ComfiLife is a GREAT company though.
customer_reviews.text: I experienced a severe case of sciatica and was desperate for relief. I purchased the product on recommendation of friends so I ordered it pronto. The delivery was fast and easy. Unfortunately, I found the cushion too short and it cut off my circulation to my leg due to the edge of the cushion hitting me mid-thigh. Fortunately, ComfiLife responded quickly to my plight. They offered me a lumbar support cushion instead without any additional costs to me. Now that's what I call "EXEMPLARY CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!". They were so understanding and generous to exchange their product. Thank you ComfiLife!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for fractured sacrum comfort
customer_reviews.text: I fractured my sacrum. Geez! It hurt a lot. This cushion made things like riding in a car, sitting in a crappy airplaneseat, sitting at work, and watching tv on the couch bearable. Now that my back is mostly healed, I’m still using it. I love how comfortable it is and keeps my posture in check. If I could suggest an improvement, I’d want them to make the very bottom layer firmer so that as it compacts down over time, the bottom of the spine is still protected from touching anything.
customer_reviews.author: ncjean

customer_reviews.title: Tears of joy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pillow for my husband, who has lover back issues and what he deems as "butt pain". His maiden voyage sitting one it, he almost cried. Honestly, I think he did actually cry, but he wont admit it. And of course, they were tears of joy! His wish is to have one for each room in the house, one for work and one for the car. 😂 Needless to say, he's SUPER happy with it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: emilee shelley

customer_reviews.title: Not Necessarily for Users over 170 Pounds.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the pillow when I first sit on it, however, it flattens quickly from body heat and weight. I weigh 170 lbs. and my partner weighs over 200. These cushions have some measure of help in keeping you in place in your seat, but that can be an up or down mark if you move around in your office chair. The coccyx supportive cushioning is the one positive I can speak about highly. It allows for the body to sit "exactly" where it should in the cushion. If the entire cushion were as think/supportive as the edges, it would've gotten an all five star rating from me. Save your money and purchase one that is a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you can’t rely on reviews—not as helpful with tailbone pain as reviews would suggest
customer_reviews.text: Really didn’t help with tailbone pain from falling injury. Was surprised at the lack of relief. Hope this helps. If you are middle-aged, fell on your tailbone from a slippery ice patch, and in a lot of pain, this isn’t as big a help to mitigate pain as the reviews would suggest. I regret the purchase and will return. It really makes you think there are fake reviews. Very disappointed. The item sinks flat as memory foam does, and so it’s not that cushiony. Maybe memory foam isn’t for this kind of application.
customer_reviews.author: jmy-umma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the recumbent bike!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use on my recumbent bike and it's incredible! I had a labral tear repair surgery on my hip and have to do the bike for a total of 2 hrs per day.... My butt would go numb on the bike and this cushion makes a world of difference!!! I had tried a sharper image cushion I found at TJ Maxx and this one is far better than that brand! I highly recommend this cushion!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin W.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet relief...
customer_reviews.text: So, I've lost a bunch of weight and have bones poking when I sit in my chair. I know, terrible problem to have. This pad DOES squish down some, but I'm really hoping that the gel-part does help it to hold up. I can't say how this would hold up for a heavy person, but it is giving this poor behind so much relief, that I want one for my car! And maybe for another chair in my home (I dislike having to cart pads/pillows around) It is that much relief. And yes, this is probably the one downside to losing weight that no one tells you about. You pick up this butt pad-and you'll thank me!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 of these so far
customer_reviews.text: After many purchases, I thought I should leave a review. I have purchased 3 of these in my life time and just recently got my 3rd one. Each one previous has been handed down and both my daughters love this cushion. Always better than whatever your chair manufacturer considers ample cushion (NEVER IS). Thus with this I can sit longer if needed at the desk in better comfort. Or even if you are sitting for short periods of time, give your buttocks some love. Seriously considering a 4th to take around to sit on when not at my favorite one in my office. :) Enjoy, I know I do :)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't comfortable for me. Item returned.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more reviews before ordering this. As some have pointed out, it has a hump in the front of the pillow that caused discomfort in the genital area (I'm an adult male, 5'11" tall and 215 lbs). It also didn't feel like the foam offered much support in other areas where I wanted it, for instance under the legs and buttocks. Now, in all fairness, it wouldn't be fair to say that this won't work for everyone, because I think comfort is entirely a subjective issue. But in my experience, I found it wasn't comfortable for me. I returned it and found another cushion that felt a lot better to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: youpickedawinner

customer_reviews.title: This is the best, most comfortable cushion I've found.  This is number eight.
customer_reviews.text: I have hip issues and hamstring tendonosis that make sitting miserably painful. I've purchased seven others at prices up to $99.99. This cushion feels soft to me but doesn't bottom out (I'm talking to you, Mr. $100 Inflatable). I have one at the office, one in my home office, and one in my car. The one in the car goes with me to doctor appointment, restaurants, etc. That's embarrassing but I'd rather be embarrassed momentarily than in pain for two weeks because I sat on a hard wooden chair at a restaurant (Mother's Day last year). These have been on sale on Lightning Deals. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Bell

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver for Sciatica
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I hoped this would work but thought the pain I’d been in was beyond a simple seat cushion. I’ve been working from home (haven’t we all) and while I spent a decent amount on my desk chair, I was still ending the day in pain. I googled and determined I likely was experiencing sciatic nerve pain. So I decided we’ll try another cushion. This thing changed my life. I don’t say this lightly. I went from lying awake with this annoying ache, to not having any pain at all in a few weeks. It is not an immediate solution, but it does work. I’m so glad I gave in and purchased this!!
customer_reviews.author: PrettyBEBE

customer_reviews.title: You and your back will love it, belive me.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, this is magic, it relief my coxy and sciatica pain in just a few hours, it is super comfortable, just try it, youll love it, also if you are a person that stay a lot of time seated on a desk, I highly recomend you to also buy a foot rest, I recomend a paded foot rest instead of a plastic one , also dont recomend foot rest that comes with rollers. hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Quake

customer_reviews.title: Flat as a pancake after 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I was really needing support for a long work day at my desk. Initially I thought this was going to be the solution. After 15 minutes I relaxed I to the cushion and in thirty I was aching the same. The cushion, once fluffy, now was flat. I am heavier than average, I’d hope they are not only designed for a person on average BMI... I think they are. Guess I’ll be shopping again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Kitten

customer_reviews.title: ComfiLife Gel Seat Cushion great solution!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the customer reviews on this ComfiLife Gel Seat Cushion and immediately ordered one. I’m using this cushion during the Coronavirus stay-at-home orders, I do not have ergonomic chairs in my home. My dining table is my office and my grandmas 1958 small dining chairs are uncomfortable. While no cushion made anywhere will relieve all discomfort or posture issues, this ComfiLife Gel Seat Cushion has definitely helped me get through an 8-12 hour day sitting in front of a computer. It provides me help when sitting down as I’m a 5’11” female. Remember to get up frequently anyways and take stretching breaks. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Wagner

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I choose this after reading most of the reviews on all of the different brands. I bought this for my husband who is in contant pain from a pinched sciatic nerve. He has had some relief while using the pillow, especially when he has to ride in the car. I am so happy that I purchased this pillow. I especially like that it has a cover that I can wash.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Will try again later
customer_reviews.text: At first this was comfortable. After 4-5 days, I developed pain in the area of my tailbone. It turned out to be a rash. I have the pad airing out in the garage. Not sure if I didn't air it out enough before using or sitting wrong or it doesn't fit. Will keep it and see what happens in the future. It appears to be a well-made cushion so worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Bit Twiddler

customer_reviews.title: ok, Butt.....
customer_reviews.text: Ok, first, I have 2 ruptured discs. I was in extreme pain for weeks. I thought this would be soft to sit on. It is NOT. So don't buy if you need something like an air cushion. This cushion is very firm. Now weeks have gone by, with nerve meds, tylenol, and ibuprofen, my back is feeling a lot better. (9 weeks). I can now sit on this cushion, on a wooden desk chair to work. Don't laugh, but I originally use 2 folded bath towels, a small pillow, and an air cushion all stacked to sit on the chair. Now I can use just this gel cushion. It is comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: spockmckoy

customer_reviews.title: Tall/thick
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It is definitely thick and makes you sit noticeably higher than without it. Still getting used to it, but it has seemed to help relieve some tailbone/low back pain. I use it in my office chair at work. I like that it is not just memory foam, but also has the gel inside as well. It does still get warm with use as it absorbs your body heat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holder

customer_reviews.title: Amazing support. Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased another brand of this type cushion and really wasn’t happy with it. I read about this one and hesitantly ordered it thinking there would probably not be that much difference. Boy was I wrong! This cushion is fabulous! So much firmer and I love the gel; I don’t get overheated anymore. It has held its shape well and I use it everyday at home. I want to get one for my office chair and one for the car. I deal with sciatic issues and pain down my left leg.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Read

customer_reviews.title: Harder than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow I received is a bit harder than I expected. It feels cool at first, but it warms up and stays warmer for a longer time than my all memory foam pillow, which is actually a bit uncomfortable to me. I will keep this because it gets the job done - helps with some back pain and keeps my tailbone from getting sore while working at my desk for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Moreno II

customer_reviews.title: Surgery saver!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had low back surgery Monday and was told “no recliner”. Kitchen chairs were easiest to get out of, but was killing my butt, hips and spine by the end of the first day home. I ordered this and it has made my recovery much more comfortable! I couldn’t tolerate car rides either so we tried putting this in the car. AMAZING! I tolerated a ride to the store! This has literally saved my week!!!! Takes the pressure off of the spine and hips!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, comfy and life changing!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Thank you so much for this product, what a life (tail) saver! A few years back, I broke my tailbone and recently discovered that I have a benign tumor in the same area that makes it impossible for me to sit comfortably. I am preparing for a flight and was concerned how I would be able to travel comfortably and found this cushion. It’s a MUST for a broken tailbone!! Thank you!!!! I can sit and watch TV, paint, have dinner with my family in comfort. I can’t say thank you enough! I just wish I had found this before my neck surgery since it was torture sitting still for a month.
customer_reviews.author: 5boysand2dogs

product_meta.title: ComfiLife Gel Enhanced Seat Cushion - Non-Slip Orthopedic Gel & Memory Foam Coccyx Cushion for Tailbone Pain - Office Chair Car Seat Cushion - Sciatica & Back Pain Relief
feature_bullets: BEST GEL MEMORY FOAM CUSHION ON THE MARKET: ComfilLife's ALL-IN-ONE features are unrivaled: NON-SLIP rubber bottom, BUILT-IN HANDLE for easy transport and machine-washable zippered velour cover for EASY CLEANING. The ComfiLife Coccyx Cushion is the BEST gel memory foam seat cushion on the market made of premium quality durable memory foam with cool off gel layer on top for superior comfort
SUPPORTS TAILBONE AND RELIEVES PRESSURE: Ergonomically designed seat cushion provides maximum support and comfort while reducing pressure on the coccyx / tailbone and promotes healthy posture

PROVIDES LOWER BACK PAIN & SCIATICA RELIEF. GREAT FOR OFFICE USE, DRIVING & TRAVELING: Supports recovery from lower back problems, herniated discs, tailbone injuries, sciatica and other spinal issues. Great for office, home, travel, car seat or wheelchair use. Machine-washable zippered velour cover for easy cleaning and built-in handle for easy transport

OUR CUSTOMERS LOVE COMFILIFE CUSHION: "I have already recommended this to all my office mates that sit all day, as well. I love it, and some advice...Lock it up after you use it, or I guarantee one of your sneaky cube mates will swipe it!" "This has saved my life as one with lower back pain due to pinched nerve roots" "I have herniated discs and sciatica for many years, this cushion allowed me to drive cross state with little to no pain"

LIFETIME WARRANTY: ComfiLife is trusted by millions of happy customers around the world. Your complete satisfaction is our top priority. If you’re not 100% satisfied, we offer a Lifetime Money Back or Replacement Guarantee with no questions asked.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars17,757 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
